summary: This is a memorandum from the Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) documenting a voluntary interview conducted on August 5, 2021, with a Correctional Systems Officer from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. The interview is part of an official OIG investigation into the death of inmate Jeffrey Epstein at MCC New York. The memorandum lists attachments including the interview transcript and various prison logs and records from August 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the OIG investigation into his death while housed at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York. His inmate register number is 76318-054.

persons.name: Correctional Systems Officer
persons.context: A Federal Bureau of Prisons (BOP) officer at MCC New York who was voluntarily interviewed by OIG Senior Special Agent and Special Agent regarding the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's death.

persons.name: Senior Special Agent
persons.context: A Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General agent who, along with a Special Agent, conducted the voluntary interview of the Correctional Systems Officer.

persons.name: Special Agent
persons.context: A Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General agent who, along with a Senior Special Agent, conducted the voluntary interview of the Correctional Systems Officer.

persons.name: Preparer
persons.context: Individual who prepared this OIG memorandum. Title is listed but name is not provided.

persons.name: Reviewer
persons.context: Individual who reviewed this OIG memorandum. Title is listed as 'Assistant Special Agent in Charge' but name is not provided.

connections.description: The Senior Special Agent, along with a Special Agent, conducted a voluntary interview of the Correctional Systems Officer as part of the OIG investigation.
The Special Agent, along with a Senior Special Agent, conducted a voluntary interview of the Correctional Systems Officer as part of the OIG investigation.
The Correctional Systems Officer was a BOP officer at the MCC New York where inmate Jeffrey Epstein was housed prior to his death.

events.title: OIG Interview of Correctional Systems Officer
events.description: Senior Special Agent and Special Agent from the DOJ Office of the Inspector General conducted a voluntary, recorded interview of a Correctional Systems Officer from MCC New York regarding the death of Jeffrey Epstein.

events.title: MCC New York Daily Log Entry
events.description: A Form PP38 Daily Log was created at MCC New York, referenced as an attachment to the OIG investigation report.

events.title: MCC New York Count and Roster Documentation
events.description: MCC New York generated a Daily Assignment Roster and Count documentation at 12 a.m., referenced as attachments to the OIG investigation report.

locations: Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) New York, New York, New York
Boston Area Office (DOJ OIG Reporting Office)
keyFacts: The Department of Justice Office of the Inspector General (OIG) conducted an official investigation into the death of BOP inmate Jeffrey Epstein at MCC New York.
A voluntary, recorded interview of a Correctional Systems Officer from MCC New York was conducted on August 5, 2021, as part of this investigation.
The memorandum references several key prison documents from August 2019 as attachments, including daily logs, assignment rosters, count sheets, and a housing history report.
Jeffrey Epstein's BOP inmate register number was 76318-054.
The document is an internal OIG memorandum containing no recommendations or conclusions, and its distribution is restricted to the receiving agency.
